mapper.sql: id,approve_code, code, sorting, is_del, status, use_by, use_at, use_position, use_equipment_type, approve_by, approve_at, approve_opinion, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version, remarks, is_use
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO el_use( approve_code, code, sorting, is_del, status, use_by, use_at, use_position, use_equipment_type, approve_by, approve_at, approve_opinion, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, version, remarks, is_use ) VALUES ( #{approveCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sorting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{usePosition,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useEquipmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approveAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUse, jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE el_use
approve_code = #{approveCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sorting = #{sorting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
use_by = #{useBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
use_at = #{useAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
use_position = #{usePosition,jdbcType=BIGINT},
use_equipment_type = #{useEquipmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_by = #{approveBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
approve_at = #{approveAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_opinion = #{approveOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=TINYINT}
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.approve_code, t1.code, t1.sorting, t1.is_del, t1.status, t1.use_by, DATE_FORMAT(t1.use_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as use_at, t1.use_position, t1.use_equipment_type, t1.approve_by, DATE_FORMAT(t1.approve_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as approve_at, t1.approve_opinion, t1.create_by, DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_at, t1.update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t1.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as update_at, t1.version, t1.remarks, t1.is_use,org.name AS name FROM el_use t1 LEFT JOIN el_organization org ON t1.use_position = org.id WHERE t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND org.status != 99
